Text:
A:10 V:9 Good Movie, Good torrent. Could use some more seeds, but its not too slow. I'll seed for awhile. 
Thanks achaevil for the download
Also, the audio started for me in Hindi, just change it to English unless you're Indian or something :)

Aspect ratio of the file is 1:2.35 but the picture is really in 16:9 so use the Aspect-ratio-feature of VLC to set it right.
Also, missing the end-credits.

I would find another release. :-/
